medium: Ink, color, and gold on silk
title: Welcoming Descent of the Amida Triad
description: golden Buddha figure with halo stands on a cloud at center; PL hand extended downward, index finger and thumb clasped in blessing gesture; PR hand bent upward with similar gesture; two other figures below Buddha painted in gold; figure at LL stands with hands together in front bowing subtly; LR figure kneels, admiring lotus-shaped object in hands
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Carol Brooks
